summary: A black ops sniper is blackmailed by a psychotic international terrorist into killing 6 unrelated people in 6 hours... but there is more to the victims than meets the eye.
cast: Martin Kemp|Dani Dyer|Donna Air|Phil Davis|Bea Segura|Jota Haya|Juan Tendero|Bartley Burke|Paulina Ventura|Paco Lopez|Patrick Bergin|Lucy Pinder|Nick Moran|Meg Dawson|Carla Cresswell|Peter Brooke|April Pearson|Jimmy 'The Bee' Bennett|Chris Brazier|Anouska Mond|Damian Russell|Simon Nader|Simon DeSilva|Michael Dobby|Terry Diab|Michael Shepherd|Nick Maison|Ryan Palmer|Sebastian Street|Tony Denham|Steve Brunton|Hugh Neal|Lee Wakefield|Terri Dwyer|Boris Hiestand|Leon Corbin|Barry McStay|George McCluskey|Marcus Langford|Melvyn Barnes|Nick Thomas-Webster|Johnny Palmiero|Bruce Payne|Dexter Fletcher|Francesco Tribuzio|Hannah Harrison|Antony Clegg|Patricia Navarro|Vernoica Lopez|Paquito Lopez|Patri Lopez|Paul Blackwell|Andrew Zographos|Matt Townsend|Jonathon Michaels|Mark Ryder|Robbie Manners|Jim Lawrence|Taylor Tay|Matt Long|Jordan Hiscott|Tony Hamilton|Murray C Kelso|Jeremy Preston|Dean Kingdon|Richard Horsley|Andrew Gruszka|Ian Stewart|Mark Loughran|Jamie Bourne|Simon Cluett|Mike Firth|Brandon Q W McConnell|Chris Pearson|Robert Rivett|Olivia Sloyan|Lexi Somerton|Pete Steel
title: Age of Kill
